caption: Relating to the enrollment, including resident status and tuition rates, of certain persons, including persons not authorized to be present in the United States, in public institutions of higher education.
undersanding:
Summary (English):
This bill modifies Texas education code regarding tuition rates and resident status. It mandates that persons not authorized to be in the US cannot be considered state residents for tuition purposes. Universities must notify law enforcement upon discovering unauthorized students. This affects all international students without proper documentation, including Chinese students who are not legally present in the US.

中文总结：
该法案修改德克萨斯州教育法规中关于学费和居民身份的规定。规定未获得合法在美居留身份的人员不能被视为州内居民享受州内学费优惠。大学在发现无证学生时必须通知执法部门。这影响所有没有合法居留身份的国际学生，包括在美无合法身份的中国学生。
